snippet: Barbara Lee of the Congressional Progressive Caucus and another reader warn of the dangers of further United States involvement.
abstract: Letter from Rep Barbara Lee responds to October 28 editorial criticizing Obama administration's strategy for combating Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
